name: Bridge Global IT Staffing
overview:
Bridge supports software companies in their growth by finding the right and skilled developers/designers they are looking for. International outsourcing – outsourcing work – is the driving force behind this. With headquarters in Netherlands, Bridge has offshore and nearshore development centers in India, Ukraine and Moldova and offices in Sweden, Germany and Denmark.

Many people wonder if hiring IT programmers or designers offshore is a good idea and whether it is suitable for their company. Questions arise:

Do the advantages outweigh the costs? How do I develop my processes? How do I develop a clear strategy? Is Eastern Europe a better choice than India or not? Can we outsource as a smaller company? How do I manage people from a distance?

We are convinced that international IT outsourcing offers many organizations a comfortable and profitable prospect.

Global IT Staffing

The solution to your IT staffing problems

Offshore or global IT staffing entails that you hire programmers and designers who work at our offices abroad. Our offices are located in Ukraine, Moldova and India. The IT specialists are there for the picking. You will quickly find programmers and designers you are looking for.

European service, offshore costs

Bridge Global IT Staffing links Dutch knowledge and service with attractive offshore cost savings. Wages in offshore countries are much lower and you will not be working with your own staff. That is why there are no employers’ and other costs that come with employees in your own company.

Flexible Contracts

You hire your team members for a week, month, year or another period of time. Scaling is quick and easy, you do not have to worry about attracting people, human resources, taxes, paying salaries and office equipment. You will receive an invoice every month and Bridge Global IT Staffing takes care of the rest.

Preparation IT offshoring

Offshoring’s success depends on the preparation. In three steps you can create a firm foundation for a successful IT offshoring project. Bridge offers personal support regarding

Drawing up profiles

You hire your IT talent at the level and quantity you want. On the basis of your criteria Bridge carefully puts together a profile for every programmer or designer. Which communicative and technical skills does your IT employee need to have? Do you already know exactly which jobs you want to outsource?

Selecting your employees

Then you personally select – in consultation with Bridge – the right people via Skype or telephone. Or would you rather meet your employees in person? That is also possible. You choose the people you feel confident in. That way we make sure that your new colleagues fits in with your organization.

Workshop

In a workshop Bridge will find out which processes in your company are suitable for a cooperation. You will benefit from our experience with previous offshore projects. If you do not yet have suitable processes, Bridge with develop them with you. Together we also determine your company’s and Bridge’s responsibilities.
